remarks: The subword of a concatenation as function.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 27-May-2018.)
statement: swrdccatfn $p |- ( ( ( A e. Word V /\ B e. Word V ) /\ ( M e. ( 0 ... N ) /\ N e. ( 0 ... ( ( # ` A ) + ( # ` B ) ) ) ) ) -> ( ( A ++ B ) substr <. M , N >. ) Fn ( 0 ..^ ( N - M ) ) ) $.
